pci_additional_ips_floatingips_edit_desc: Select the instance you want to attach the {{serviceName}} IP address to.
pci_additional_ips_floatingips_edit_succ: The instance attached to the IP {{ip}} has been edited.
pci_additional_ips_floatingips_edit_erro: An error has occurred editing the attached instance: {{error}}
pci_additional_ips_floatingips_edit_gate: We couldn't find a Gateway in the selected private network that is required to attach this floating IP. Please create one first, or select another instance/private network.
